amendatorysection.catchline: Motorcycle safety instructor's or chief instructor's permit; denial, suspension, or revocation; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: The director may cancel, suspend, revoke, or refuse to issue or renew a motorcycle safety instructor's permit or chief instructor's permit in any case when the director finds the permittee or applicant has not complied with or has violated the Motorcycle Safety Education Act or any rule or regulation adopted and promulgated by the director. A suspended or revoked permit shall be returned to the director by the permittee, and its holder shall not be eligible to apply for a permit under section 60-2127 or 60-2129 until twelve months have elapsed since the date of such suspension or revocation. Any action taken by the director to cancel, suspend, revoke, or refuse to issue or renew a permit shall comply with the Administrative Procedure Act.
